about: I am a highly skilled and curious software engineer with expertise in mobile development, mobile architecture, machine learning, and data analytics, holding a Master's degree in Physics and Astronomy. I thrive in dynamic environments, am a quick learner, and stay updated on the latest technologies. In my free time, I enjoy board games, video games, drone flying, and programming-related hobby projects. Family is paramount, and I'm eager to collaborate with like-minded individuals and organizations to create innovative technological solutions.
